alert.note: Alert for Renville (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:55PM CDT until August 10 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BOTTINEAU AND SOUTHERN RENVILLE COUNTIES... At 655 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lansford, or 27 miles north of Minot, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lansford around 700 PM CDT. Glenburn around 705 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Grano. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
